title: Ceragon Networks Shares Spike To Session High As Traders Circulate Needham Research Note Suggesting Co. Confirmed It Closed Contract With New US Tier 1 Corporation, Says Contract Was Unexpected And Not Built Into Its Model
Ceragon Networks shares are trading lower after the company reported worse-than-expected Q1 EPS and sales results. UPDATE: Shares have since reversed, now higher.
